title: Suggestion: "Be able to report a player when you queue dodge in ranked"
body: I would like to suggest that if you dodge in ranked because a player has locked in a champion and declared they were going to feed, you get to submit a report - implicate one or two players and give a reason as to why you would be willing to sacrifice your LP to dodge. The chat in the champ select screen is also submitted to Riot.

replies.body:
Unfortunately the following still means you lose your LP. Screenshot all chat during champion select and proceed to dodge the game. Then submit a support ticket to Riot with your issue and screenshots attached.

Best of luck.

It is possible. I know of some games that allow you to report players after you have finished and left a game. This is for a number of reasons, mainly due to your game crashing like LoL does after it is over or you just wanting to get away from the abuse your team is handing out.

The same can be done once the game has started but not yet started. The game client can easily be made to save all chat logs and player behaviour, how fast did they select a champ and lock in, what was said and so on.

Than you just hit report for whatever, the screenshot and stats go with it and done.
Chat logs in champion select are already recorded by Riot. That's why you send in screenshots to Riot through support and they will check the champion select for that game themselves.

so many think your not allowed to insterlock but you are there is no rule agenst it there is also no rule saying if you are at the bottom of the game and have last pick that you get what ever role is left if you were first pick went top and I was last I could go top and riot wont do anything as there is no rule

There are no rules, plain and simple.

That said, we make community rules so that games can be fun and fair at the same time - you *can* insta-lock, you *can* feed, you *can* troll. But we don't want you to, so we ask that Riot helps us to enforce our rules to make it a fun game.
every thing you sed after        There are no rules, plain and simple is made void as like you sed there are no rules and riot wont enforce a rule they don't have

*Ugh* There are no rules in the game. So we make our own.

Oh, and isn't there a report category for "feeding"? Feeding isn't illegal, we just don't like it.

Oh^2; fix your grammar, that way we might have a valid argument.
I like the idea, but you're better off joining a push for a vote-kick in champion select, that way people don't lose any points or get a penalty.

I'm a platinum teemo main, I've played teemo for over 200 games now. I'm currently sitting at a 56% win rate with him. That means I win more games than I lose with him. I get abused by the enemy team, and my own team for picking my favourite champion, and now you're giving them the power to kick me for it too?

Well, I hope not. People *can* abuse the system, but I meant more so for people who instalock and say "mid or feed XD".

Nice score though, keep it up! (Grrh I hate playing vs teemo)
